createRandom(7,0,å›å¤æ¥¼å±‚) //æŠ½å¥–.
æºç å¼•è‡ª yedanbo/createRandom().js


function createRandom(num,from,to)
{
    var arr=[]; 
    var json={};  
    while(arr.length<num)
    {
        var ranNum=Math.round(Math.random()*(to-from))+from;
        if(!json[ranNum])
        {
            json[ranNum]=1;
            arr.push(ranNum); 
        }
    }
    return arr;
}
